member.name: M:Topshelf.SerilogConfigurationExtensions.UseSerilog(Topshelf.HostConfigurators.HostConfigurator)
member.summary: Configures Topshelf to use Serilog for logging, using the global instance to derive its loggers.

member.name: M:Topshelf.SerilogConfigurationExtensions.UseSerilog(Topshelf.HostConfigurators.HostConfigurator,Serilog.LoggerConfiguration)
member.summary: Configures Topshelf to use Serilog for logging, using the given to create loggers.

member.name: M:Topshelf.SerilogConfigurationExtensions.UseSerilog(Topshelf.HostConfigurators.HostConfigurator,Serilog.ILogger)
member.summary: Configures Topshelf to use Serilog for logging, using the given root logger to create loggers.
